Package presenters.gui

Class CrazyEightsGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • presenters.gui.GUI
      • presenters.gui.CrazyEightsGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, CrazyEightsIO, GameIO
    public class CrazyEightsGUI
extends GUI
implements CrazyEightsIO, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class implements the CrazyEightsIO interface using Swing to create a GUI to play the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CrazyEightsGUI

        public CrazyEightsGUI()
        Creates a new instance of CrazyEights GUI. This will cause a GUI window to open. All implemented methods will do user interaction through this window or popups.
